alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 17 at 8:43PM MST until February 19 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible in the mountains and gusts to 60 mph at lower elevations. * WHERE...Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Walsenburg Vicinity/Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Feet, Trinidad Vicinity/Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Feet and Eastern Las Animas County. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles traveling along I-25 from Colorado City south to Raton Pass.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
